Text:
A few selected elites from the Shadow Garden gather
for joint training with the Seven Shadows.
Hyaaahhh!
Whoops.

(I imbued my strike with considerable magic...
How did she deflect it?!)
What's wrong? Don't tell me you're tired already.
Ack... I'm just getting started...!
You moves are way too...predictable!
Wha—?! M-My sword...
Alright, we're done.
O-Once more, please! This time, I'll—

Nope, not happening. No matter how many times we do
this, the results will be the same.
Urgh...!

Now, now, calm down. I'm not saying you're weak or
anything.

In fact, it's pretty terrifying how skilled you are
for a regular member. You're not even one of the
Numbers.

What's with the scary face? Are you really that
dissatisfied with your current position?

No, I'm content. Given my past actions, just being
accepted into the Garden is more than I deserve.

It's just...I've no intention of being complacent
in my role as a mere member.
That's quite bold of you to say.

I received my power directly from Master Shadow—
my existence is "special."

Apart from the Seven Shadows, only myself and
No. 666 were given such a direct privilege. I must
become worthy of that gift.

...Yet, for some reason, I feel like you were
stronger before.
What...?

Alright, today's training is over. Go back and get
some rest.
I was stronger...before...?

(I've given up everything for Master Shadow...
and yet...)

(Could it be...my devotion to Master Shadow is
lacking...?!)
No, it can't be! It just can't—
(...But, at the very least, Lady Zeta seems to feel so.)
(I must become stronger...huh?)

If you could've only seen Master Shadow's gallant
expression...! It's a shame you weren't there, Beta!
(That's Lady Epsilon and—)

I saw it myself, thank you very much! In fact, if I
weren't busy protecting the princess—

...Wait, it's this late already?! I got so caught
up listening...

Now that I've entertained you with a story, you'd
better make sure to do it justice.

If you do a half-baked job representing Master
Shadow's exploits, I won't forgive you.

(Lady Epsilon and...Lady Beta? Wait, if they're
talking about Master Shadow's exploits...then...)

Of course, I'll do it justice! I don't cut corners
with my writing.

Especially when it comes to The Chronicles of
Master Shadow—
Lady Beta, Lady Epsilon. Greetings.

Wha—?! No. 559, how long have you been standing
there?!

I heard your voices, so I wanted to come say hello.
In fact, I have a small favor to ask.
A favor?

—And so Master Shadow continued to dodge Aurora's
countless spears with flawless grace and beauty...!

That's our Master Shadow! I can't believe he evaded
the Calamity Witch so effortlessly...!

He maintained his defensive stance while carefully
watching the enemy's every move before seizing
the briefest opportunity to strike... Such skills are
beyond the grasp of amateurs...!
Ohh...! Master Shadow...!

(To hear the tales of his exploits from The
Chronicles of Master Shadow firsthand...!
It was truly worth approaching them...!)

(The Goddess' Trial against Aurora is one of the
penultimate scenes. I've read it over and over
again...)

Naturally, that's to be expected of Master Shadow!
Oh...and that intense, piercing gaze he had when
confronting Aurora was simply magnificent! If only
I could be on the receiving end of such a gaze...!

I don't know if I could bear to stand against
Master Shadow... But to catch even a fleeing look
from those piercing eyes...wouldn't be too bad.

(The stories told by those who've witnessed his
deeds firsthand feel utterly different.)

(If I can make a name for myself and take on
important missions...maybe one day...)

...As the Seven Shadows, do you often get to meet
with Master Shadow?

Yes, we're responsible for delivering regular
reports, among other things. That said, Master
Shadow rarely speaks...

Oh, is that so? I actually received a compliment
from him the other day... I suppose that was one
of those rare occasions.
Wha—?! Wh-Wh-What?!
M-Master Shadow complimented you directly...?!

Indeed. He said to me, "Epsilon, has your figure
improved?" all while gazing intently...at my chest.
Urgh!

But I'm not quite sure it was deserved. After all,
unlike a certain somebody, I'm really not all that
fit or cute...
Nghh!

I felt a bit guilty getting all the attention,
especially since it's not like I'm putting in
any extra effort or anything.
Grrrrrrr!!!

(I haven't even caught a glimpse of him, let alone
had the chance to meet him...)

(...I should've known as much. Despite also being
granted power directly from Master Shadow, there's
a world of difference between the Seven Shadows
and a mere member like myself.)
(But I...)
E-Epsilon. Tone it down a bit—

...Thank you both for your company today. I have
training to attend to soon, so I'll take my leave
now.
Hey, wait...! I wonder what's up with No. 559?
